description: A customer in dark sunglasses has been acting strange around Hanamaru. He orders something new each time he comes, but only takes a small bite before leaving. Whenever he shows up, someone breaks in and steals one of Min’s chest wraps. It’s up to the NEETs and Narumi to catch the criminal and make him pay! But for some odd reason he’s able to slip through all of their security. Who could this mystery thief be…?

titles.title: A Full Account on Hanamaru`s Soup
A História Por Trás Do Caldo Hanamaru!
